data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matsuzaki, Koji, Hibino, Mai, Komai, Tomoyuki (2015): A new species of the caridean shrimp genus Lebbeus White, 1847 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Thoridae) from the southwestern Sea of Okhotsk, Hokkaido, Japan. Zootaxa 4032 (3): 309-318, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4032.3.6
